artist: Artist: Françoise Gilot; Author: Colette; Translator: Enid McLeod; Publisher: The Limited Editions Club; Printer: Wild Carrot Letterpress , (line drawing and text); Printer: Studio Heinrici, Ltd., New York , (silkscreens)
description: binding: deep blue chinese silk, gold-stamped lettering; endpapers: blue-grey wove; slipcase: powder blue laid paper over cardboard, stamped title in white; type: Monotype Bembo; 154 pp.
medium: Color screenprints and reproductions of drawings, letterpress; bound volume
provenance: Bruce B. Dayton, Wayzata, Minn.; given to MIA, 1987.
title: Break of Day
